title: How a free game became a money machine
text:
How a free game became a money machine 10:15am EDT - 02:41
Millions of people are obsessed with Epic Games' Fortnite Battle Royale -- a free-to-play game that has become a money-making machine for both the creators and live-streaming gamers who've mastered it. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
